titleInfo.title: A superadditive solution for cephoidal bargaining problems

mods.abstract: We present a bargaining solution defined on a class of polytopes in R-n called "cephoids". The solution generalizes the superadditive solution exhibited by Maschler and Perles for two dimensions. It is superadditive on a subclass of cephoids.
